name: Bob The Construction Cube
description:
Bob the Construction Cube is a short puzzle platformer made for the WOWIE! 4.0 Game Jam. In it, you play as bob and you are trying to collect your hammers but your buddy, S.P.U.D, a well-intentioned robot that is trying its best to help you, keeps accidentally destroying your work! Try to build your way to the hammers without S.P.U.D. messing up all your work!

Also, there might be a weird issue with the font size, I'm trying to figure out a fix right now but I haven't figured it out yet. If any of you work with ue4 and know a solution to this then that would be very helpful. Thanks!

Fullscreen button may make the game easier to see and play but has weird borders that unreal engine makes that I can't get rid of for some reason. Sorry!

Controls:
AD: Move
W: Jump
E: Interact/Enter Build Mode
Space: Place Block
Arrow Keys: Position Block
Q: Enter Destroy Mode
